import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./App.css"; // Importing all necessary icons import { Gamepad2, Trophy, Star, Zap, Sparkles, BookOpen, WifiOff, Languages, Bot, Mail, Phone, MapPin, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Youtube, Lock } from 'lucide-react'; import { Routes, Route, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; // Placeholder Components (You can keep your existing ones) import Login from "./Login"; import Signup from "./Signup"; import Dashboard from "./components/Dashboard"; import Chatbot from "./components/Chatbot"; export default function App() { const [view, setView] = useState("home"); const navigate = useNavigate(); // --- Data for the UI Sections --- const features = [ { icon: , color: "bg-teal", title: "Works Offline", text: "Learn without internet - download lessons and study anywhere." }, { icon: , color: "bg-orange", title: "Fun Games & Quizzes", text: "Earn XP, badges and compete with friends while learning." }, { icon: , color: "bg-blue", title: "Multiple Languages", text: "Learn in English, Hindi, Telugu and more regional languages." }, { icon: , color: "bg-pink", title: "AI Tutor", text: "Get instant help from our smart chatbot anytime." } ]; const subjects = [ { title: "Mathematics", count: "45 Lessons", color: "grad-math", xp: 1200, progress: 65, icon: "üî¢" }, { title: "Science", count: "52 Lessons", color: "grad-science", xp: 980, progress: 42, icon: "‚öõÔ∏è" }, { title: "Technology", count: "38 Lessons", color: "grad-tech", xp: 650, progress: 28, icon: "üíª" }, { title: "Social Studies", count: "48 Lessons", color: "grad-social", xp: 0, progress: 0, icon: "üåç" }, { title: "English", count: "55 Lessons", color: "grad-english", xp: 0, progress: 0, icon: "üìù" }, { title: "Hindi", count: "50 Lessons", color: "grad-hindi", xp: 0, progress: 0, icon: "üáÆüá≥" }, { title: "Arts", count: "35 Lessons", color: "grad-arts", xp: 0, progress: 0, icon: "üé®" }, { title: "Engineering", count: "Locked", color: "grad-locked", xp: 0, progress: 0, icon: } ]; return (
